mapper.select: SELECT sum( c.cart_num ) FROM kx_store_cart AS c left join kx_stock as s on s.product_id = c.product_id WHERE c.uid = #{userId} and s.storage_id = #{storageId}

SELECT c.id, c.product_id AS productAttrId, p.store_name AS productAttrName, c.product_id AS productId, p.store_name as productName, c.cart_num as cartNum, s.price, p.ot_price AS otPrice, p.image AS productImg, p.image AS productAttrImg, s.stock, p.cate_id AS cateId FROM kx_store_cart AS c left join kx_store_product p on p.id = c.product_id left join kx_stock s on s.product_id = c.product_id WHERE c.uid = #{userId} and s.storage_id = #{storageId}
